repository.name: attackgen
repository.description: AttackGen is a cybersecurity incident response testing tool that leverages the power of large language models and the comprehensive MITRE ATT&CK framework. The tool generates tailored incident response scenarios based on user-selected threat actor groups and your organisation's details.

development_potential.assessment: Excellent potential for integration. High community engagement with 1179 stars and active development. Consider for immediate evaluation.
